column1: “the  petitioner  has  an  alternate  remedy,  as  the  Customs

section 154. In the circumstances, the petitioner is not entitled
For  the  foregoing  reasons,  I  hold  that  the  Petitioners  are  not
entitled to proceed with this Application. I refuse to issue notices
on the Respondents and dismiss the Application. No costs.
